code_sample.sample: LET g_xxxx_m.xxxx001_desc = ' ' DISPLAY BY NAME g_xxxx_m.xxxx001_desc IF NOT cl_null(g_xxxx_m.xxxx001) THEN IF p_cmd = 'a' OR (p_cmd = 'u' AND (g_xxxx_m.xxxx001 != g_xxxx_m_t.xxxx001 OR g_xxxx_m_t.xxxx001 IS NULL )) THEN INITIALIZE g_chkparam.* TO NULL LET g_chkparam.arg1 = g_xxxx_m.xxxx001 LET g_chkparam.arg2 = ' ' IF NOT cl_chk_exist("v_xxxx001") THEN LET g_xxxx_m.xxxx001 = g_xxxx_m_t.xxxx001 CALL axxm001_xxxx001_ref() NEXT FIELD CURRENT END IF END IF END IF CALL axxm001_xxxx001_ref()

LET g_xxxx_m.xxxx001_desc = ' ' DISPLAY BY NAME g_xxxx_m.xxxx001_desc IF NOT cl_null(g_xxxx_m.xxxx001) THEN IF p_cmd = 'a' OR (p_cmd = 'u' AND (g_xxxx_m.xxxx001 != g_xxxx_m_t.xxxx001 OR g_xxxx_m_t.xxxx001 IS NULL )) THEN CALL s_xxxx_chk(g_xxxx_m.xxxx001)RETURNING g_errno IF NOT cl_null(g_errno) THEN CALL cl_err('',g_errno,1) LET g_xxxx_m.xxxx001 = g_xxxx_m_t.xxxx001 CALL axxm001_xxxx001_ref() NEXT FIELD CURRENT END IF END IF END IF CALL axxm001_xxxx001_ref()

LET g_xxxx_m.xxxx001_desc = ' ' DISPLAY BY NAME g_xxxx_m.xxxx001_desc IF NOT cl_null(g_xxxx_m.xxxx001) THEN IF p_cmd = 'a' OR (p_cmd = 'u' AND (g_xxxx_m.xxxx001 != g_xxxx_m_t.xxxx001 OR g_xxxx_m_t.xxxx001 IS NULL )) THEN IF axxm001_xxxx001_chk() THEN ELSE LET g_xxxx_m.xxxx001 = g_xxxx_m_t.xxxx001 CALL axxm001_xxxx001_ref() NEXT FIELD CURRENT END IF END IF END IF CALL axxm001_xxxx001_ref()

FORMAT
ON EVERY ROW PRINTX g_grNumFmt.* PRINTX

#检查是否在事务中 IF NOT s_transaction_chk('Y',1) THEN LET r_success = FALSE RETURN r_success END IF
